QuestData.Title: The Embalmer's Revenge
QuestData.Description: You're not the first fool to be manipulated by Abercrombie! That doddering old man is known as The Embalmer to us. He's a vile necromancer and a blight upon this town.$B$BAnd now, sewn together and given life by the very materials you brought him, his horrible creation approaches!$B$BThat hideous creature will be upon us in mere moments! If you have any heart, $n, you'll help the Night Watch drive off the abomination and save our town!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank the Light, he's gone...$B$BI'll say you've made amends by helping save the lives of those here, $n.
